author.name: Licensed by Woolworths - ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Give a lighter twist to the classic steak sandwich from Philadelphia by adding pan-fried summer vegetables.
name: Summer Vegetable Philly Cheese Steak Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large green capsicum, chopped into large pieces
1 small eggplant, roughly chopped into large pieces
500g sirloin steak, chilled for 45 minutes to make slicing easier

recipeInstructions.text: In a heavy-based frying pan, melt 1 tbs of the butter over a medium-low heat. Add the onion, green capsicum, eggplant, mushrooms, chilli flakes, and garlic. Season well. Cook the vegetables, stirring occasionally, for 15-20 minutes, or until tender.

Meanwhile, cut the steak into paper-thin slices. In a separate heavy-based frying pan, heat the remaining butter and cook the steak over a medium-high heat. Add a pinch of salt and cook the meat, stirring occasionally, for 3-5 minutes, or until browned.
Slice each sub roll in half lengthways, without cutting through the bottom, and line each roll with 2 slices of cheese. Add the vegetables and top with the steak. Serve hot with mustard.
